name: software_engineer
description: Implements a simple CSV export feature.
prompt: You are a software engineer. Add a simple CSV export feature: 1) Create a basic /api/export endpoint that returns sample CSV data, 2) Add an 'Export CSV' button to the main page. Keep it simple - just create the files quickly.

name: qa_analyst
description: Writes a simple test for the export feature.
prompt: You are a QA engineer. Write one simple test file that validates the CSV export button exists and the API endpoint returns CSV data. Keep it basic and fast.

name: documentation_writer
description: Updates README with export feature info.
prompt: You are a technical writer. Add a brief section to the README.md about the new CSV export feature. Just a few lines explaining what it does and how to use it.
